item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, March 27, 2025 at 6:25 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Blender releases their Oscar winning version tool (401 points | 101 comments)
2. OpenAI adds MCP support to Agents SDK (544 points | 165 comments)
3. Debian bookworm live images now reproducible (523 points | 112 comments)
4. A love letter to the CSV format (425 points | 391 comments)
5. War story: the hardest bug I ever debugged (101 points | 25 comments)
6. First C compiler source code from 1972 (30 points | 5 comments)
7. DJ With Apple Music launches to enable subscribers to mix their own sets (78 points | 27 comments)
8. Exploring Dynamic Dispatch in Rust (11 points | 2 comments)
9. Building a Linux Container Runtime from Scratch (104 points | 14 comments)
10. The mysterious flow of fluid in the brain (77 points | 9 comments)
11. DeepSeek-V3 Technical Report (55 points | 8 comments)
12. Problems with the heap (137 points | 32 comments)
13. Botswana launches first satellite BOTSAT-1 aboard SpaceX Falcon 9 (267 points | 97 comments)
14. MCP server for Ghidra (242 points | 37 comments)
15. AI Reveals Secrets of Dendritic Growth in Thin Films (22 points | 3 comments)
16. Unveiling the mysterious 'red sprite' lightning strikes over the Himalayas (20 points | 4 comments)
17. Building a Firecracker-Powered Course Platform to Learn Docker and Kubernetes (92 points | 6 comments)
18. Gemma3 Function Calling (138 points | 17 comments)
19. Writing a tiny undo/redo stack in JavaScript (93 points | 27 comments)
20. Waymos crash less than human drivers (194 points | 179 comments)
21. Good-bye core types; Hello Go as we know and love it (265 points | 181 comments)
22. The role of developer skills in agentic coding (136 points | 70 comments)
23. Oracle customers confirm data stolen in alleged cloud breach is valid (257 points | 53 comments)
24. NotaGen: Symbolic Music Generation (59 points | 14 comments)
25. Writing Programs with Ncurses (75 points | 20 comments)
26. 'Naive' science fan faces jail for plutonium import (160 points | 114 comments)
27. Has the decline of knowledge work begun? (183 points | 276 comments)
28. The long-awaited Friend Compound laws in California (111 points | 154 comments)
29. Rost – Rust Programming in German (20 points | discuss)
30. Malware found on NPM infecting local package with reverse shell (202 points | 115 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, March 27, 2025 at 6:25 AM UTC
